column1: IMPORTANT ITEMS TO PACK Important items to bring with you include: - First aid kit - Immunization records - Insurance ID cards - Medical records for chronic illnesses or recent major surgery - Name and phone numbers of your pharmacist and health care providers - Nonprescription medications that you might need - Sunscreen, hat, and sunglasses ON THE ROAD Know what steps need to take to prevent different diseases and infections.

This includes: - How to avoid mosquito bites - What foods are safe to eat - Where it is safe to eat - How to drink water and other liquids - How to wash and clean your hands well Know how to prevent and treat traveler's diarrhea if you are visiting an area where it is a common problem (such as in Mexico).
